item.description:
I noticed a lot of us have dogs. Might be fun for us to socialize as well as get our furry friends some exercise. We'll try out Singing Beach in Manchester on the 15th at noon. We can take the dogs for a walk then grab coffee or lunch someplace in Manchester Center. Dogs aren't required to attend, so if you would like to get out and see the waves in January please come along.

Information about the beach and directions can be found through this link.

http://www.manchester...

Any questions please email or call me at 781-420-9497.

I'll be with my two German Shorthaired Pointers, Logan and Darby.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be with my two GSPs. We'll meet right past the bathhouse on the sand.
item.name: Singing Beach Dog Stroll - Dogs optional!
